air:AirPriceRsp.common_v51_0:ResponseMessage: Taxes returned at the FareInfo level are for informational purposes only, and may differ from those returned at the Itinerary/Passenger Type levels.

air:AirSegment.PolledAvailabilityOption: O and D cache or polled status used with different local status

air:Brand.Name: Economy Flex
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Flex
EcoFlex
air:Brand.air:Text:
Economy Flex includes:
• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 0.7 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Changes permitted for a fee • Refunds permitted for a fee
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
Economy Flex lets you choose your seats for free, and you can enjoy more baggage allowance and more flexibility to change your booking.

Economy Flex includes:
• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 0.7 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Changes permitted for a fee • Refunds permitted for a fee
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
Includes rebooking or refunds against a fee, and seat reservation

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Take everything you need

Baggage policy
Customers are allowed two bags of up to 23kg each in Economy Class, and two bags of up to 32kg each in First Class or Business Class. For Central and South America, customers are allowed two bags of up to 32kg each in all classes.
Further baggage details are available at Emirates.com

Baggage policy
Customers are allowed two bags of up to 23kg each in Economy Class, and two bags of up to 32kg each in First Class or Business Class. For Central and South America, customers are allowed two bags of up to 32kg each in all classes.
Further baggage details are available at Emirates
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Checked baggage
AMS BAGS

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Taking bags on board

Your cabin baggage allowance depends on which cabin class you're flying in.
Emirates First Class and Business Class customers can carry two pieces of carry-on baggage: one briefcase plus either one handbag or one garment bag.
Emirates Economy Class customers are permitted one piece of carry-on baggage - either a handbag or laptop bag.
You can find out more on the Emirates website.

Your cabin baggage allowance depends on which cabin class you're flying in.
Emirates First Class and Business Class customers can carry two pieces of carry-on baggage: one briefcase plus either one handbag or one garment bag.
Emirates Economy Class customers are permitted one piece of carry-on baggage - either a handbag or laptop bag.
You can find out more on the Emirates website.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Hand Luggage
Hand Lugg

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Making changes to your reservation
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Changes
Changes

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Flexibility when you need it
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Refundable
Refund

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Pre assign your preferred seat in advance

Seat Selection. Refer to Fare Quote for applicability.
Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the options to pre assign seats might be different. Information may differ for customized fare offering.

Seat Selection. Refer to Fare Quote for applicability.
Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the options to pre assign seats might be different. Information may differ for customized fare offering.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Seat Assignment
Seats

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Seat selection 48hrs prior

Seat selection 48hrs prior for Business Special fare. If you are travelling on a Business Special fare you can select a complimentary seat when check‑in opens 48 hours before you fly. Skywards Platinum members can select their seat anytime.

Seat selection 48hrs prior for Business Special fare. If you are travelling on a Business Special fare you can select a complimentary seat when check‑in opens 48 hours before you fly. Skywards Platinum members can select their seat anytime.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Seat selection 48hrs prior
SA 48hrs

air:OptionalService.air:Text: On board catering
Meals and beverages
Meals and beverages
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Meals and beverages
Meals

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Movies, TV and so much more
Choose from over 2,500 channels of movies, TV shows, music and games, on demand and in multiple languages.
Choose from over 2,500 channels of movies, TV shows, music and games, on demand and in multiple languages.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: ICE entertainment
ICE

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Connecting you in the sky

It’s free to blog, post or tweet from your seat on all of our A380 and select Boeing 777 aircraft. Enjoy 10MB of free data (that’s enough to search, send emails and update Facebook). You can also pay just USD 1 to use up to 500MB, meaning you can stay connected throughout your flight.*
*Wi-Fi isn’t available on our A330 and A340 aircraft.

It’s free to blog, post or tweet from your seat on all of our A380 and select Boeing 777 aircraft. Enjoy 10MB of free data (that’s enough to search, send emails and update Facebook). You can also pay just USD 1 to use up to 500MB, meaning you can stay connected throughout your flight.*
*Wi-Fi isn’t available on our A330 and A340 aircraft.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Wi-Fi in the sky
WiFi

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Earn and save

The number of Miles you earn depends on the fare type you choose: Special, Saver, Flex or Flex Plus.
Economy Special 25% flown miles earned Saver 35% Flown miles earned Flex 70% flown miles earned Flex Plus 100% flown miles earned
Business Special 100% flown miles earned Saver 125% flown miles earned Flex 175% flown miles earned Flex Plus 190% flown miles earned
All First Class fares earn 250% miles

The number of Miles you earn depends on the fare type you choose: Special, Saver, Flex or Flex Plus.
Economy Special 25% flown miles earned Saver 35% Flown miles earned Flex 70% flown miles earned Flex Plus 100% flown miles earned
Business Special 100% flown miles earned Saver 125% flown miles earned Flex 175% flown miles earned Flex Plus 190% flown miles earned
All First Class fares earn 250% miles
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Mileage Accrual
Mileage

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Starting your journey in style

Make the most of every moment on your journey when you fly in Emirates
First Class or Business Class by booking our complimentary Chauffeur-drive service. We’ll collect you from your door and, when you land, we’ll be there to take you to your final destination. Enjoy our exclusive Chauffeur-drive service in over 70 cities worldwide - simply book online in advance.
*Complimentary Chauffeur Drive service on certain itineraries with flights operated by Emirates are subject to T&C. Please refer www.emirates.com for details.

Make the most of every moment on your journey when you fly in Emirates
First Class or Business Class by booking our complimentary Chauffeur-drive service. We’ll collect you from your door and, when you land, we’ll be there to take you to your final destination. Enjoy our exclusive Chauffeur-drive service in over 70 cities worldwide - simply book online in advance.
*Complimentary Chauffeur Drive service on certain itineraries with flights operated by Emirates are subject to T&C. Please refer www.emirates.com for details.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Chauffeur Drive
CDRIVE

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Relax away from the crowds

Emirates lounges offer respite on the road with gourmet buffets, a la carte meals and fresh juice bars.
You can take some time for yourself with a soothing spa, massage or beauty treatment while you wait for your flight.
You ll find our lounges at over 30 airports worldwide.

Emirates lounges offer respite on the road with gourmet buffets, a la carte meals and fresh juice bars.
You can take some time for yourself with a soothing spa, massage or beauty treatment while you wait for your flight.
You ll find our lounges at over 30 airports worldwide.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Lounge Access
Lounge

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Meet the world at 40,000ft
Take a break, stretch your legs and meet some of the most interesting people on the planet in our A380 Onboard Lounge - exclusive to First Class and Business Class customers.
Take a break, stretch your legs and meet some of the most interesting people on the planet in our A380 Onboard Lounge - exclusive to First Class and Business Class customers.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Onboard Lounge
OL

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Reawaken your senses in the onboard Shower Spa

Theres nothing quite like a rejuvenating shower to leave you feeling inspired. Prepare for your arrival in our A380 Shower Spa, using our selection of Bvlgari toiletries and signature Timeless Spa products.
Once you ve finished pampering, replenish your energy with one of our detoxifying fresh juices. Just the boost you need to feel ready to take on the day.

Theres nothing quite like a rejuvenating shower to leave you feeling inspired. Prepare for your arrival in our A380 Shower Spa, using our selection of Bvlgari toiletries and signature Timeless Spa products.
Once you ve finished pampering, replenish your energy with one of our detoxifying fresh juices. Just the boost you need to feel ready to take on the day.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Shower Spa
Shower

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Check in at a separate exclusive zone
Emirates Skywards members can check in at dedicated counters at all airports in our network, and our Silver, Gold and Platinum members are invited to board early.
Emirates Skywards members can check in at dedicated counters at all airports in our network, and our Silver, Gold and Platinum members are invited to board early.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Priority Check in
Priority

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Avoid the queues
Speed through immigration at most airports. We give you a fast track card when you fly in Emirates First Class or Business Class, or if you’re an Emirates Skywards Gold or Platinum member.
Speed through immigration at most airports. We give you a fast track card when you fly in Emirates First Class or Business Class, or if you’re an Emirates Skywards Gold or Platinum member.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Fast Track
Fast Track

air:Brand.Name: Economy Flex Plus
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Flex Plus
EcoFlxPlus
air:Brand.air:Text:
Economy Flex Plus includes:
• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 1 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Eligible to upgrade with Skywards Miles • Changes permitted free of charge • Fully refundable
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
Upgrade to Economy Flex Plus to enjoy the full flexibility to make changes to your booking, enjoy more baggage allowance, choose your seats for free, and earn more Skywards Miles.

• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 1 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Eligible to upgrade with Skywards Miles • Changes permitted free of charge • Fully refundable
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.

First Class or Business Class by booking our complimentary Chauffeur-drive service. We’ll collect you from your door and, when you land, we’ll be there to take you to your final destination. Enjoy our exclusive Chauffeur-drive service in over 70 cities worldwide - simply book online in advance.
*Complimentary Chauffeur Drive service on certain itineraries with flights operated by Emirates are subject to T&C. Please refer www.emirates.com for details.

CDRIVE

You can take some time for yourself with a soothing spa, massage or beauty treatment while you wait for your flight.
You ll find our lounges at over 30 airports worldwide.

air:TextInfo.air:Text: BAGGAGE DISCOUNTS MAY APPLY BASED ON FREQUENT FLYER STATUS/ ONLINE CHECKIN/FORM OF PAYMENT/MILITARY/ETC.

air:Brand.Name: Economy Flex Plus
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Flex Plus
EcoFlxPlus
air:Brand.air:Text:
Economy Flex Plus includes:
• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 1 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Eligible to upgrade with Skywards Miles • Changes permitted free of charge • Fully refundable
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
Upgrade to Economy Flex Plus to enjoy the full flexibility to make changes to your booking, enjoy more baggage allowance, choose your seats for free, and earn more Skywards Miles.

Economy Flex Plus includes:
• Free seat selection and paid seat selection • Earn 1 Skywards Mile for every mile flown • Checked baggage allowance • Cabin baggage 1 bag up to 7kg • Regional multicourse dining • Complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks • Up to 5,000 channels of entertainment • Free unlimited online chat messaging for Emirates Skywards Gold members • Buy great value Wi-Fi plans • Eligible to upgrade with Skywards Miles • Changes permitted free of charge • Fully refundable
Please refer to the terms and conditions of the fare and the rules of the destination • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service will vary. The content on this screen is for information purposes only. Please validate brands and ancillaries at Fare Quote.
Includes rebooking refunds free of charge

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Take everything you need

Baggage policy
Customers are allowed two bags of up to 23kg each in Economy Class, and two bags of up to 32kg each in First Class or Business Class. For Central and South America, customers are allowed two bags of up to 32kg each in all classes.
Further baggage details are available at Emirates.com

Baggage policy
Customers are allowed two bags of up to 23kg each in Economy Class, and two bags of up to 32kg each in First Class or Business Class. For Central and South America, customers are allowed two bags of up to 32kg each in all classes.
Further baggage details are available at Emirates
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Checked baggage
AMS BAGS

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Taking bags on board

Your cabin baggage allowance depends on which cabin class you're flying in.
Emirates First Class and Business Class customers can carry two pieces of carry-on baggage: one briefcase plus either one handbag or one garment bag.
Emirates Economy Class customers are permitted one piece of carry-on baggage - either a handbag or laptop bag.
You can find out more on the Emirates website.

Your cabin baggage allowance depends on which cabin class you're flying in.
Emirates First Class and Business Class customers can carry two pieces of carry-on baggage: one briefcase plus either one handbag or one garment bag.
Emirates Economy Class customers are permitted one piece of carry-on baggage - either a handbag or laptop bag.
You can find out more on the Emirates website.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Hand Luggage
Hand Lugg

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Making changes to your reservation
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Changes
Changes

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Flexibility when you need it
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
All Flex Plus fares on Emirates are entitled to free changes and and are fully refundable. Please refer to the fares rules for further details on Special, Saver and Flex terms and conditions.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Refundable
Refund

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Pre assign your preferred seat in advance

Seat Selection. Refer to Fare Quote for applicability.
Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the options to pre assign seats might be different. Information may differ for customized fare offering.

Seat Selection. Refer to Fare Quote for applicability.
Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the options to pre assign seats might be different. Information may differ for customized fare offering.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Seat Assignment
Seats

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Seat selection 48hrs prior

Seat selection 48hrs prior for Business Special fare. If you are travelling on a Business Special fare you can select a complimentary seat when check‑in opens 48 hours before you fly. Skywards Platinum members can select their seat anytime.

Seat selection 48hrs prior for Business Special fare. If you are travelling on a Business Special fare you can select a complimentary seat when check‑in opens 48 hours before you fly. Skywards Platinum members can select their seat anytime.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Seat selection 48hrs prior
SA 48hrs

air:OptionalService.air:Text: On board catering
Meals and beverages
Meals and beverages
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Meals and beverages
Meals

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Movies, TV and so much more
Choose from over 2,500 channels of movies, TV shows, music and games, on demand and in multiple languages.
Choose from over 2,500 channels of movies, TV shows, music and games, on demand and in multiple languages.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: ICE entertainment
ICE

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Connecting you in the sky

It’s free to blog, post or tweet from your seat on all of our A380 and select Boeing 777 aircraft. Enjoy 10MB of free data (that’s enough to search, send emails and update Facebook). You can also pay just USD 1 to use up to 500MB, meaning you can stay connected throughout your flight.*
*Wi-Fi isn’t available on our A330 and A340 aircraft.

It’s free to blog, post or tweet from your seat on all of our A380 and select Boeing 777 aircraft. Enjoy 10MB of free data (that’s enough to search, send emails and update Facebook). You can also pay just USD 1 to use up to 500MB, meaning you can stay connected throughout your flight.*
*Wi-Fi isn’t available on our A330 and A340 aircraft.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Wi-Fi in the sky
WiFi

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Earn and save

The number of Miles you earn depends on the fare type you choose: Special, Saver, Flex or Flex Plus.
Economy Special 25% flown miles earned Saver 35% Flown miles earned Flex 70% flown miles earned Flex Plus 100% flown miles earned
Business Special 100% flown miles earned Saver 125% flown miles earned Flex 175% flown miles earned Flex Plus 190% flown miles earned
All First Class fares earn 250% miles

The number of Miles you earn depends on the fare type you choose: Special, Saver, Flex or Flex Plus.
Economy Special 25% flown miles earned Saver 35% Flown miles earned Flex 70% flown miles earned Flex Plus 100% flown miles earned
Business Special 100% flown miles earned Saver 125% flown miles earned Flex 175% flown miles earned Flex Plus 190% flown miles earned
All First Class fares earn 250% miles
